column4: Can someone help me connect to the internet on Ubuntu via wireless.
what wifi card do you have? can you give more details on what you have done to troubleshoot?
have i lost you about my request?
I dont know what wifi card i have.
external or internal?
its built in if thats what you mean?
is it? then you can type  sudo lshw -C network
it says command not found
what exactly is the command you typed?
sudo Ishw -C network
it worked so what am i looking for?
what was my question earlier?  what brand? chip?
it was what wifi i had
I am new to all this and half of what your saying doesnt make no sense to me.
i can emphatize, but asking what brand should be easy to read from that command, you have to do some legwork too
Realtek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. <<< that it?
yes, now what chip? use the pastebin for results of sudo lshw -C network
Can you PM me please as i would find it easier.
nope, stay here on the main channel so others can learn from us or provide additional insights
Well I dont understand what it is you are asking for.
well i will ask you to read the following
you have to do your part, so we can help you
